summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the Alley in Block 106, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition, being the alley between Eighth Avenue and Ninth Avenue, running from Union Street to University Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and planking the same; by constructing wood bulkheads where necessary and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2330 of the City Council of the City of Seattle; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
